Message.Title: Combatting the Dangerous Rise of Bath Salts
Message.Msg: Dear Fellow New Yorker, The illegal use of bath salts and other synthetic drugs has become increasingly widespread and poses a serious threat to public health and safety in New York State. This year, there have already been 191 emergency room visits in upstate New York as a result of using bath salts. These visits show a drastic increase from the 39 reported visits in 2011. *** Naturally, Governor Andrew Cuomo thinks we need new regulations to "combat" this. How about this: Allow the idiots to die and send their families a posthumous Darwin Award.

Topic.Title: 90% Of All Federal Income Taxes Now Paid By TOP 20%!!

Message.Msg: "A study of 280 Fortune 500 corporations from the Citizens for Tax Justice (CTJ) and the Institute on Taxation and Economic Policy (ITEP) calculates their average effective tax rates — for the period 2009-2010 it was 17.3 percent, less than half the statutory " 10 Most Profitable U.S. Corporations Paid Average Tax Rate Of Just 9 Percent in 2011 "Some of these companies paid more than 9 percent -- JPMorgan earned $26.7 billion in 2011, for example, and paid $3.7 billion of it, or 14 percent, to the federal government -- and some paid less, like Exxon Mobil, which only sent 2 percent of its $73.3 billion earnings to the IRS."

Message.Msg: Comrade, I grew up on the hard streets in Russia and the US! I know what poverty is and I never met anyone that would not work because they were lazy! Some people won’t work for "GARBAGE WAGES!" Do you think God was LAZY, he didn’t work? You see, comrade, I am Mighty, and I cannot be fooled by Satan. He is just a little girl to me! However, I know, as a medical professional, the situation is very complicated and goes over most peoples heads, because they are not properly educated. People in poverty suffer: abuse, isolation, PTSD, depression, personality disorders, Alcoholism, drug addiction … Incompetence … THERE ARE MANY, MANY REASONS WHY PEOPLE CANT WORK! OH and I must remind you, most Americans are being medicated for "one or more" of the above! YOU CHEAT SOME … THEY MAY WANT TO KILL YOU, THEREFORE, THEY CANT WORK BECAUSE THEY HAVE AN AXE TO GRIND. THE MAIN REASON WHY EVERYONE (100-MILLION AMERICANS) ARE ON WELFARE!! Bankers have (GREEDILY) exported everything, they have reduced life to ZERO, and therefore, people have nothing! Some know this and are wise enough to say: “F THEM TOO!” THE ECONOMY WOULD DIE IF MORE PEOPLE WENT ON STRIKE, COMRADE! YOU DON’T CAST PEARLS TO SWINE! IF SOMEONE WON’T PAY YOU A FAIR WAGE, THAT’S TANTAMOUNT TO MURDER, AS DO YOU THINK POVERTY AFFORDS PROPER FOOD! NO! Republican monkeys are mindless drones of Satan; SATAN is making man disgusting to GOD, that’s his plan. If you don’t treat people the way you want to be treated, YOU DON’T GO TO HEAVEN, COMRADE! Now, can you understand the situation better? I can elaborate further -and in great detail- that would tire the hand of even a heavenly scribe if you need more? I had over 20 jobs in my life and they all STUNK! I have two degrees. I don’t take lightly to liars and cowards who try to steal from other people. I could be angry, because I never took a dime from welfare or unemployment! I paid into the system and got nothing in return! I don’t support TERRORIZING THE WORLD, MURDER AND SODOMY, COMRADE! AND, I WILL NOT SUPPORT SLAVERY!
